1.6.0.en: Major performance and stability optimizations: significantly improved RAM usage and minified all dashboard widget assets.

1.7.0.en: Fixed API port handling, restructured widgets for Homey 12.3+, and updated compatibility.

1.7.1.en: Fixed invalid API calls to Prowlarr for unsupported endpoints (calendar, queue, missing, history, library). Eliminates 404 errors and reduces unnecessary network traffic.

1.7.2.en: Fixed invalid API calls to Prowlarr for unsupported endpoints (calendar, queue, missing, history, library). Eliminates 404 errors and reduces unnecessary network traffic.

1.7.3.en: Fixed widget loading issues by refactoring them to use the correct Homey SDK 3 View API. All widgets (Calendar, Downloads, Health, Library, Agenda) now function correctly.
